description: Amendments increase funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million and funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $5 million.
purpose: An amendment to reduce expenses for management of the Department of Interior by $8,000,000. Amendment also reduces appropriations to the National Forest System by $7,000,000. Amendment seeks to increase funding for the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities by $15,000,000.
